attributes.action: A referendum for people who voted to Leave the EU asking the below.
attributes.additional_details:
Results of the EU referendum have caused unprecedented socio-economic chaos in the UK, and were close: 48% Remain, 52% Leave. 

A percentage of the UK polutation has changed their minds as they felt misled by the Leave campaign. 

Roughly 1 million more people voted to Leave. If this petition reaches more than 1 million, it shows the Leave vote is unreliable on the basis of false information given to voters. PLEASE DO NOT SIGN IF YOU VOTED TO REMAIN. 

On behalf of my aunt who voted to Leave.
attributes.background:
If you voted to Leave the EU: 
1. Do you feel misled by Leave campaigners? 
2. Would you change your vote to Remain in the EU if you could?

rejection.details: This petition calls on voters, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
